title: PLEASE ID New York Time T Magazine
content:
I did a search but I wasn’t lucky.  
Sorry if this has been discussed before.  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719173138im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_3816.jpg)

 [‹ Please Identify](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719173138/http:/typophile.com/node/45377 "Go to previous forum topic") [funspot logotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719173138/http:/typophile.com/node/45413 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Cubic_DS

comments.content: Looks like [Giorgio](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719173138/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/giorgio.shtml) by Christian Schwartz, customized.
And you are proud owner of a fine flickr-stream, Costas. Congratulations.

Thanks Rainer, you’re very kind.  
My search wasn’t good enough. Christian Schwartz  
says that he produced that font for T Magazine.
